dict.string: Arrival uses your location to determine the closest BART station and automatically show realtime predictions. (We never store or share your location)
Trip data is currently based on BART's scheduled departure times and not realtime data. Future updates will enable realtime trip data.
Arrival is an open source app developed by Ronan Furuta. If you have any feedback or suggestions please email support@arrival.city
Because Arrival generates some pretty personal information, your daily commute, we store all of your information on device with optional, anonymous, cross device syncing.
Arrival harnesses modern technologies in order to receive schedules and make predictions without using tons of cellular data.
